title: (x) "Run at the speed of chat" slogan in Adidas ad - Cachet {Angel}
content:
anybody know this font?I found it in a Addidas ad.

 [‹ (x) Bernauer Straße Berlin street sign 1961 - FF City Street Type {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36943 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Oracle logo - custom designed {Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36357 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wong98

comments.content:
Cry for help!!  
anybody know this font?I found it in a Addidas ad.
I hear your cry but can see the font. Send a RGB jpeg and may the rest of us can help you.

Cry for help!!  
anybody know this font?I found it in a Addidas ad.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/font_6506.jpg)

Hi there:

A great deal of Adidas campaigns (and other shoemakers) use custom proprietary type designs that are not available for license for you and me. I’m not sure if your sample graphic falls into this category but here are some fonts that I think that look close to it:

This looks like a rounded version of FB Stainless.  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stainless](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stainless "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Stainless")

But you can also have a look at Neo San and Neo Tech.  
 [http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=415092&grab\_id=0&page\_id=3...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=415092&grab_id=0&page_id=3336&query=neo%20sans&SCOPE=Fonts "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=415092&grab\_id=0&page\_id=3336&query=neo%20sans&SCOPE=Fonts")

Mike Diaz

The slogan is from a Reebok ad isn’t it? Which would make the font Cachet.

[http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=22&y=16&sample\_text=RUN%20AT%...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220030527/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=22&y=16&sample_text=RUN%20AT%20THE%20SPEED%20OF%20CHAT&sample_size=24 "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=cachet&x=22&y=16&sample\_text=RUN%20AT%20THE%20SPEED%20OF%20CHAT&sample\_size=24")
